name: John Snow ec jam
description:
A game I made using a bunch of math... Going for Minesweeper meets Carmon Sandiago, but jam to time; time to jam.

Use mouse to select different district BLOCKS. Once selected, another screen shows up for you to 'take care', 'AUDIT', and 'EXIT.' Taking care raises your reputation and auditing lets you see who's passed away in the residence, as represented by a black dot. Both options take time.

You only have so much time, and you don't want to select the wrong pump.

Fullscreen not working well, so disabled.

Note: Game is too difficult, and you can't see end score... lots of bugs---
